original_title: Zelensky changed his tactics for Trump this time — and his outfit | CNN
article_summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky changed his wardrobe during his White House visit, opting for formal attire instead of his usual military-style clothing. This shift in attire reflects a change in tactics since his contentious meeting with President Trump in February, where his outfit was criticized. Zelensky's new look was a response to Trump's previous criticism and an attempt to improve relations.</s>
